comment.author: 34846864@N06
comment._content: Charles Kingsford Smith was another famous aviator that ended up as the subject of many songs. I was looking at music about aviators in the State Library of Queensland catalogue and found this song "Our heroes of the air that has pictures of four famous aviators on the front, including Kingsford Smith. You can also look at the score of the whole song.

comment.author: 40932353@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Australian portrait, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
